```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- read_csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
```

## Basic statistics (Table 1)

```{r}
descriptive_stats(lipidomics)
```

## Figure outputs

```{r}
ggplot(data = lipidomics, aes(x = value)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")
```

## Convert the above into a function

```{r}
#' Plot for basic distribution of metabolites
#'
#' @param data The lipidomics dataset
#'
#' @return A Histogram with the GGplot2 package
#'
plot_distributions <- function(data) {
  ggplot2::ggplot(data, aes(x = value)) +
    ggplot2::geom_histogram() +
    ggplot2::facet_wrap(ggplot2::vars(metabolite), scales = "free")
}

plot_distribution(lipidomics)
```
